message: Let's start fairly, 60% for me, 40% for you.
Let's split it evenly. A fair deal ensures we both benefit.
I'll compromise, 58% for me, 42% for you. Better than my first offer.
Time is running out, let's meet in the middle. This is a reasonable offer.
I'll go down a bit more, 57% for me, 43% for you. Let's settle.
Alice, we're getting close to a dead end. I'm offering a slight advantage for me, but it's better than losing everything.  Let's be practical.
I'll shave off a bit more, 56% for me, 44% for you. Let's wrap this up.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a tiny edge for me, but we both win something.  Don't let greed make us lose everything!
Fine, 55.5% for me, 44.5% for you. I'm not going much lower.
Alice, this is my final offer. We're down to the wire.  A slight edge to me, but we both avoid walking away with nothing. Don't be foolish!
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours. 55.25% for me, 44.75% for you. Last chance.
